title: Gamification-Based Language Learning Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital tool competency
context.additional_context: Designing a process where learners integrate learning objectives with game mechanics while conducting team-based game development projects in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design digital game scenarios aligned with language curriculum objectives.
Learners can develop language learning content by incorporating gamification elements (challenges, rewards, storytelling).
Learners can improve the educational effectiveness of game-based learning tools through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
